hero.title: Khadamatk Development Team
hero.subtitle: We are a team of Full Stack Web Developers, graduates of the Information Technology Institute (ITI) class of 2025, united under one goal: providing the best platform to connect clients with professional service providers.

story.title: Our Founding Story
story.subtitle: From ITI graduation project to national platform
story.content1: Khadamatk started as a graduation project for ITI students of 2025, where the team noticed the difficulty of finding reliable service providers in the area. Since then, the idea has evolved into a comprehensive platform connecting clients with professional service providers.
story.content2: We believe that every home and every business deserves the best services, and we strive daily to achieve this vision through our platform. We have worked as a cohesive team of full-stack web developers to create an exceptional user experience.
